content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":1,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔王の子にしてJAPAN国主である美形剣士と","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The battle between the handsome swordsman, son of the Demon King and lord of JAPAN,"},{"lineNumber":2,"originalJapaneseLine":"　金髪白肌のミステリアス美少女魔法使いの戦い」","translatedEnglishLine":"and the mysterious beautiful blonde, pale-skinned young female magician.\""},{"lineNumber":3,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔法使いと弓矢使いの戦いに、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What was thought to be a battle between a magician and an archer,"},{"lineNumber":4,"originalJapaneseLine":"　遠距離戦の対決になると思われましたが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"a long-distance fight, but...\""},{"lineNumber":5,"originalJapaneseLine":"「試合開始と共に乱義選手に一気に距離を詰められ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"At the start of the match, Rangi quickly closed the distance,"},{"lineNumber":6,"originalJapaneseLine":"　刀の刃を首に当てられたソフィア選手、降参。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sophia had the blade of a sword pressed to her neck and surrendered."},{"lineNumber":7,"originalJapaneseLine":"　得意の氷雪魔法を唱える隙もありませんでした」","translatedEnglishLine":"She did not even have the chance to cast her signature ice and snow magic.\""},{"lineNumber":8,"originalJapaneseLine":"「乱義さんの華麗な戦いに、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The arena echoed with cheers for Rangi’s splendid fight,"},{"lineNumber":9,"originalJapaneseLine":"　コロシアムには黄色い歓声が響き渡りました」","translatedEnglishLine":"where female fans’ excited cheers resounded.\""},{"lineNumber":10,"originalJapaneseLine":"「女性ファンががっぽり出来たやろうな〜。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He probably gained a whole bunch of female fans~."},{"lineNumber":11,"originalJapaneseLine":"　グッズ展開とかやらせて欲しいわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I want them to make merchandise and stuff.\""},{"lineNumber":12,"originalJapaneseLine":"「Ｂブロック二戦目、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Second match of B Block,"},{"lineNumber":13,"originalJapaneseLine":"　鎌女-ｶﾏﾒ-ＶＳワートナー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Kamame VS Wartner.\""},{"lineNumber":14,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くのいちと老魔法使いの対決やね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A showdown between a kunoichi and an old magician.\""},{"lineNumber":15,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ワートナー選手はそれはもう偉大な魔法使いで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wartner is a truly great magician,"},{"lineNumber":16,"originalJapaneseLine":"　得意魔法のてぃるとうぇいとは凄まじい威力」","translatedEnglishLine":"and his specialty magic 'Tirutoi' is tremendously powerful.\""},{"lineNumber":17,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だったのですが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However...\""},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"　鎌女選手の高速の鎖がま攻撃の前には","translatedEnglishLine":"Before Kamame's rapid kusarigama attacks,"},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"　為す術なく倒され早々と決着がつきました」","translatedEnglishLine":"he was powerless and defeated quickly, ending the match early.\""},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まー、速さ勝負のくのいちと、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, it’s a battle of speed with the kunoichi,"},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"　溜めてどかんの魔法使いじゃ、","translatedEnglishLine":"and a magician who charges up and blows things up,"},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"　相性悪すぎや、しゃーないね」","translatedEnglishLine":"their compatibility was terrible, so it can’t be helped.\""},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……と、普段ならここで終わりなのですが」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Usually the match would end here,\""},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh?\""},{"lineNumber":25,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんと、どちらかが死ぬまで決着はない！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But amazingly, there is no decision until one of them dies!"},{"lineNumber":26,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とでも言わんばかりに、無防備になった","translatedEnglishLine":"Or so it seemed, as the unguarded"},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ワートナー選手に鎌女選手の鎌が迫りました！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Wartner was approached by Kamame’s sickle!\""},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"「キーン！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Keen!\" (sound effect of metal clashing)"},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それを止めたのは試合を見ていた","translatedEnglishLine":"The one who stopped it was watching the match,"},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"　乱義選手の弓矢！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Rangi’s arrow!\""},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まるで主人公みたいやな、この子はほんま」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This kid is just like a protagonist, really.\""},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"「二人はしばし睨み合いましたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The two glared at each other for a moment,"},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"　諦めたのか、鎌女選手が離れていきます」","translatedEnglishLine":"but perhaps giving up, Kamame backed off.\""},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちなみに決着後だったので、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"By the way, since it was after the match ended,"},{"lineNumber":35,"originalJapaneseLine":"　乱義選手は失格にならずに済むそうです。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rangi apparently avoided disqualification."},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"　女性ファンの皆さん良かったですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Female fans, you can all be glad.\""},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"「二回戦はこの二人の対決が見られるわけや。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The second round will feature a rematch between these two."},{"lineNumber":38,"originalJapaneseLine":"　中々楽しみになるやないの」","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s something to really look forward to.\""},{"lineNumber":39,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかしさっきの試合といい、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But just like that match earlier,"},{"lineNumber":40,"originalJapaneseLine":"　Ｂブロックは美男、美女が多くて","translatedEnglishLine":"B Block has a lot of handsome men and beautiful women,"},{"lineNumber":41,"originalJapaneseLine":"　目に優しいな〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"which is very easy on the eyes~.\""},{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"「Ｃブロック一戦目、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"First match of C Block,"},{"lineNumber":43,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アレキサンダーＶＳ院外の翁」","translatedEnglishLine":"Alexander VS Outside Hospital Elder.\""},{"lineNumber":44,"originalJapaneseLine":"「先の鬼畜王戦争において人類側の","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In the previous Cruel King War, on the human side,"},{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"　中心で戦った英雄、最強の格闘王、","translatedEnglishLine":"the hero who fought at the center, the strongest martial artist,"},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アレキサンダー選手の試合」","translatedEnglishLine":"is Alexander’s match.\""},{"lineNumber":47,"originalJapaneseLine":"「優勝候補の一人として、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As one of the favorites for the championship,"},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もちろん試合の注目度は高い一戦です」","translatedEnglishLine":"this match naturally attracts a lot of attention.\""},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これに対する院外の翁選手。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"His opponent is Outside Hospital Elder."},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最も得意とするは幻惑魔法やら催淫魔法と、","translatedEnglishLine":"His specialties are illusion magic and incubi magic,"},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"　要は相手をえっちな気分にさせる魔法ですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"basically magic that makes opponents feel lustful.\""},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"「最っ低のエロ爺や……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The worst dirty old man...\""},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"「色々とやっていたみたいですが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He tried various things, but..."},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アレキサンダー選手には何一つ通じず、","translatedEnglishLine":"none of it worked on Alexander,"},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あっさり首に手刀を食らい気絶」","translatedEnglishLine":"and he was quickly knocked unconscious by a hand-blade strike to the neck.\""},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーん、相手が女やったら","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, if the opponent had been a woman,"},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いいとこまで行けたかも。","translatedEnglishLine":"he might have done better."},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これもクジ運の妙やね」","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s the luck of the draw for you.\""},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"「Ｃブロック二戦目、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Second match of C Block,"},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ヒーロー・ヘルマンＶＳ古代兵器・桜花」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hero Herman VS Ancient Weapon Ouka.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王の子にしてJAPAN国主である美形剣士と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The battle between the handsome swordsman, son of the Demon King and lord of JAPAN,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 金髪白肌のミステリアス美少女魔法使いの戦い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the mysterious beautiful blonde, pale-skinned young female magician."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔法使いと弓矢使いの戦いに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What was thought to be a battle between a magician and an archer,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遠距離戦の対決になると思われましたが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a long-distance fight, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「試合開始と共に乱義選手に一気に距離を詰められ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At the start of the match, Rangi quickly closed the distance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 刀の刃を首に当てられたソフィア選手、降参。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sophia had the blade of a sword pressed to her neck and surrendered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 得意の氷雪魔法を唱える隙もありませんでした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She did not even have the chance to cast her signature ice and snow magic."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「乱義さんの華麗な戦いに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The arena echoed with cheers for Rangi’s splendid fight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コロシアムには黄色い歓声が響き渡りました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: where female fans’ excited cheers resounded."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「女性ファンががっぽり出来たやろうな〜。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He probably gained a whole bunch of female fans~.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: グッズ展開とかやらせて欲しいわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want them to make merchandise and stuff."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Ｂブロック二戦目、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Second match of B Block,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鎌女-ｶﾏﾒ-ＶＳワートナー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kamame VS Wartner."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くのいちと老魔法使いの対決やね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A showdown between a kunoichi and an old magician."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ワートナー選手はそれはもう偉大な魔法使いで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wartner is a truly great magician,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 得意魔法のてぃるとうぇいとは凄まじい威力」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and his specialty magic 'Tirutoi' is tremendously powerful."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だったのですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鎌女選手の高速の鎖がま攻撃の前には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before Kamame's rapid kusarigama attacks,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 為す術なく倒され早々と決着がつきました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he was powerless and defeated quickly, ending the match early."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まー、速さ勝負のくのいちと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, it’s a battle of speed with the kunoichi,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 溜めてどかんの魔法使いじゃ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a magician who charges up and blows things up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相性悪すぎや、しゃーないね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: their compatibility was terrible, so it can’t be helped."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……と、普段ならここで終わりなのですが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Usually the match would end here,"
"Oh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんと、どちらかが死ぬまで決着はない！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But amazingly, there is no decision until one of them dies!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とでも言わんばかりに、無防備になった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or so it seemed, as the unguarded

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワートナー選手に鎌女選手の鎌が迫りました！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wartner was approached by Kamame’s sickle!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「キーン！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Keen!" (sound effect of metal clashing)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを止めたのは試合を見ていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one who stopped it was watching the match,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義選手の弓矢！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rangi’s arrow!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まるで主人公みたいやな、この子はほんま」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This kid is just like a protagonist, really."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「二人はしばし睨み合いましたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The two glared at each other for a moment,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 諦めたのか、鎌女選手が離れていきます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but perhaps giving up, Kamame backed off."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみに決着後だったので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, since it was after the match ended,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義選手は失格にならずに済むそうです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rangi apparently avoided disqualification.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女性ファンの皆さん良かったですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Female fans, you can all be glad."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「二回戦はこの二人の対決が見られるわけや。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The second round will feature a rematch between these two.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中々楽しみになるやないの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s something to really look forward to."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかしさっきの試合といい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But just like that match earlier,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｂブロックは美男、美女が多くて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: B Block has a lot of handsome men and beautiful women,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目に優しいな〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which is very easy on the eyes~."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Ｃブロック一戦目、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First match of C Block,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダーＶＳ院外の翁」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alexander VS Outside Hospital Elder."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「先の鬼畜王戦争において人類側の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In the previous Cruel King War, on the human side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中心で戦った英雄、最強の格闘王、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the hero who fought at the center, the strongest martial artist,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダー選手の試合」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is Alexander’s match."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「優勝候補の一人として、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As one of the favorites for the championship,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もちろん試合の注目度は高い一戦です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this match naturally attracts a lot of attention."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これに対する院外の翁選手。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "His opponent is Outside Hospital Elder.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最も得意とするは幻惑魔法やら催淫魔法と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His specialties are illusion magic and incubi magic,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 要は相手をえっちな気分にさせる魔法ですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: basically magic that makes opponents feel lustful."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最っ低のエロ爺や……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The worst dirty old man..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「色々とやっていたみたいですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He tried various things, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダー選手には何一つ通じず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: none of it worked on Alexander,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっさり首に手刀を食らい気絶」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and he was quickly knocked unconscious by a hand-blade strike to the neck."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん、相手が女やったら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, if the opponent had been a woman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいとこまで行けたかも。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he might have done better.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これもクジ運の妙やね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s the luck of the draw for you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Ｃブロック二戦目、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Second match of C Block,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒーロー・ヘルマンＶＳ古代兵器・桜花」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hero Herman VS Ancient Weapon Ouka."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王の子にしてJAPAN国主である美形剣士と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The battle between the handsome swordsman, son of the Demon King and lord of JAPAN,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 金髪白肌のミステリアス美少女魔法使いの戦い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the mysterious beautiful blonde, pale-skinned young female magician."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔法使いと弓矢使いの戦いに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What was thought to be a battle between a magician and an archer,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遠距離戦の対決になると思われましたが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a long-distance fight, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「試合開始と共に乱義選手に一気に距離を詰められ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At the start of the match, Rangi quickly closed the distance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 刀の刃を首に当てられたソフィア選手、降参。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sophia had the blade of a sword pressed to her neck and surrendered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 得意の氷雪魔法を唱える隙もありませんでした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She did not even have the chance to cast her signature ice and snow magic."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「乱義さんの華麗な戦いに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The arena echoed with cheers for Rangi’s splendid fight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コロシアムには黄色い歓声が響き渡りました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: where female fans’ excited cheers resounded."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「女性ファンががっぽり出来たやろうな〜。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He probably gained a whole bunch of female fans~.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: グッズ展開とかやらせて欲しいわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want them to make merchandise and stuff."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Ｂブロック二戦目、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Second match of B Block,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鎌女-ｶﾏﾒ-ＶＳワートナー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kamame VS Wartner."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くのいちと老魔法使いの対決やね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A showdown between a kunoichi and an old magician."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ワートナー選手はそれはもう偉大な魔法使いで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wartner is a truly great magician,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 得意魔法のてぃるとうぇいとは凄まじい威力」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and his specialty magic 'Tirutoi' is tremendously powerful."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だったのですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鎌女選手の高速の鎖がま攻撃の前には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before Kamame's rapid kusarigama attacks,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 為す術なく倒され早々と決着がつきました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he was powerless and defeated quickly, ending the match early."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まー、速さ勝負のくのいちと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, it’s a battle of speed with the kunoichi,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 溜めてどかんの魔法使いじゃ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a magician who charges up and blows things up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相性悪すぎや、しゃーないね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: their compatibility was terrible, so it can’t be helped."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……と、普段ならここで終わりなのですが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Usually the match would end here,"
"Oh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんと、どちらかが死ぬまで決着はない！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But amazingly, there is no decision until one of them dies!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とでも言わんばかりに、無防備になった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or so it seemed, as the unguarded

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワートナー選手に鎌女選手の鎌が迫りました！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wartner was approached by Kamame’s sickle!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「キーン！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Keen!" (sound effect of metal clashing)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを止めたのは試合を見ていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one who stopped it was watching the match,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義選手の弓矢！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rangi’s arrow!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まるで主人公みたいやな、この子はほんま」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This kid is just like a protagonist, really."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「二人はしばし睨み合いましたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The two glared at each other for a moment,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 諦めたのか、鎌女選手が離れていきます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but perhaps giving up, Kamame backed off."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみに決着後だったので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, since it was after the match ended,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義選手は失格にならずに済むそうです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rangi apparently avoided disqualification.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女性ファンの皆さん良かったですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Female fans, you can all be glad."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「二回戦はこの二人の対決が見られるわけや。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The second round will feature a rematch between these two.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中々楽しみになるやないの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s something to really look forward to."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかしさっきの試合といい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But just like that match earlier,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｂブロックは美男、美女が多くて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: B Block has a lot of handsome men and beautiful women,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目に優しいな〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which is very easy on the eyes~."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Ｃブロック一戦目、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First match of C Block,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダーＶＳ院外の翁」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alexander VS Outside Hospital Elder."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「先の鬼畜王戦争において人類側の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In the previous Cruel King War, on the human side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中心で戦った英雄、最強の格闘王、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the hero who fought at the center, the strongest martial artist,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダー選手の試合」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is Alexander’s match."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「優勝候補の一人として、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As one of the favorites for the championship,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もちろん試合の注目度は高い一戦です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this match naturally attracts a lot of attention."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これに対する院外の翁選手。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "His opponent is Outside Hospital Elder.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最も得意とするは幻惑魔法やら催淫魔法と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His specialties are illusion magic and incubi magic,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 要は相手をえっちな気分にさせる魔法ですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: basically magic that makes opponents feel lustful."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最っ低のエロ爺や……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The worst dirty old man..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「色々とやっていたみたいですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He tried various things, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダー選手には何一つ通じず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: none of it worked on Alexander,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっさり首に手刀を食らい気絶」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and he was quickly knocked unconscious by a hand-blade strike to the neck."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん、相手が女やったら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, if the opponent had been a woman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいとこまで行けたかも。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he might have done better.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これもクジ運の妙やね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s the luck of the draw for you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Ｃブロック二戦目、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Second match of C Block,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒーロー・ヘルマンＶＳ古代兵器・桜花」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hero Herman VS Ancient Weapon Ouka."
